ygData.subject: spell question
ygData.msgSnippet: Couple of things: First - Personally, I would rather see this mailing list as a way for ALL clerics to exchange class specific information, rather than a place
ygData.messageBody:
Couple of things:

First - Personally, I would rather see this mailing list as a way for
ALL clerics to exchange class specific information, rather than a place
for you to argue your selection of race. Arguing back and forth only
clutters everyone's mailbox. And because this mailing list does not
exist in the land of Norrath, RP-ing here is merely a waste of time -
when it is knowledge that should be shared here.

Second - I am level 34. Anyone level 39 or higher have information on
any additional DD spells that cleric will receive above wrath in damage
amount that are NOT only for use on undead?? Specifically the amount
of damage that any future spells will do.

Thanks!! :)

Sirensa
Cleric questing for knowledge...
